thread.title: Sen. Cruz bringing presidential campaign to Kalamazoo
thread.title_full: Sen. Cruz bringing presidential campaign to Kalamazoo

author: detroitnews.com
title: Sen. Cruz bringing presidential campaign to Kalamazoo
text:
U.S. Sen. Ted Cruz (Photo: Getty Images) 
U.S. Sen. Ted Cruz of Texas will speak to supporters of his campaign for the Republican nomination for president during a Monday morning rally in Kalamazoo.
Cruz is scheduled to speak at 9:15 a.m. inside Kalamazoo’s Wings Event Center. The event will mark Cruz’s third campaign visit to Michigan and his second in the past month.
The junior senator from Texas was a keynote speaker Sept. 19 at the Michigan Republican Party’s biennial leadership conference on Mackinac Island.
In June, Cruz spoke in Howell at a fundraiser for the Livingston County Republican Party.
For Cruz’s Monday morning rally, doors open at 8:30 a.m. to the general public. The event is scheduled to begin at 9 a.m.
Cruz is one of 15 candidates seeking the Republican nomination for president in 2016. He ranks sixth in RealClearPolitics.com’s average of national polls and fourth in a rolling average of polls in Iowa , which will hold its first-in-the-nation caucuses on Feb. 1.
